Localisation.Text: A group of larger rats springs out of a side corridor onto you
Angry Swarm
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
There is a man who can enchant your very body, for a price.
Augmenter
In the backalleys of the city many gambling rings operate.
Backalley Gambling
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
You finally make your way to the heart of the cave. There the party prepares for a tough battle.
Boss Battle
Perfect Preperation is what preserves prosperity. Did you do yours before departing?
Blacksmiths Favour
You find some treasure that you can loot. The only catch is the way out is blocked.
Blocked Drop
The passage ahead has collapsed, you'll have to dig through.
Blocked Passage
Some treasure sits balanced at the end of a precarious pile of things. It'll be all yours if you can break it out.
Breakout
The way is shut. It can be opened only by those who can smash. Get smashing.
Break Through
To join you alchemists guild you have to take 3 examinations. The final test is to make 3 potions with your gathered herbs.
Alchemy Guild 3:Brewing Test
You never know what you may find if you have a dig around.
Buried Treasure
The city is filled with opportunities for those willing to seize them
Career Choices
You come across a room filled with crumbling pillars. In the distance you can see some treasure.
Chain Reaction
Monsters block the way forward. The only option is to smash through.
Choke Point
Your barn is filled with old, rotting, leftover crates. Smash them up to clean some space.
Cleanup
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
To survive as an adventurer you must be proficient at combat. Have you trained enough?
Combat Training

An altar stands a short distance ahead of you, surrounded by a cloying, corrupting energy. Monsters crowd around it, distorted and empowered. Destroy the altar before its corruption can spread further!
Corrupting Altar
By channeling the energy within you can empower yourself with abilities. Have you trained enough?
Cultivation Training
With the gate open you can finally descend into the depths.
Descent
You wake up and everything changes...
Devastation
Something gleams beneath a mound of debris. Dig it out, it may be worth something.
Diamond in the Rough
You spot a pile of equipment discarded in a corner. Something may still be usable.
Discarded Equipment
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
To improve your endurance you've been eating well and exercising vigorously. Did it pay off?
Endurance Training
An evil altar sits up ahead. With vigorous prayer you can cleanse it of its corruption.
Evil Altar
You find an advertisement asking for volunteers to try a new drug.
Experimental Drug
The farmers market is an opportunity to finally make some money by selling the produce you have grown.
Farmers Market
Life on a farm is tough. Waking at the crack of dawn and working until sun sets. It breeds hard people, strong willed and strong armed.
Farm Life
It is well know that large donations to the temple also equal large favours from the gods.
Favour of the Gods
One of the most common (and most annoying) quests for an adventurer is the fetch quest.
Fetch Quest
One of the most common (and most annoying) quests for an adventurer is the fetch quest.
Fetch Quest
One of the most common (and most annoying) quests for an adventurer is the fetch quest.
Fetch Quest
The best way to try out new armour is in combat. The blacksmith is offering one of his latest creations to anyone who volunteers.
Field Testing
As you walk through the city you come across a blazing building. Some shouts indicate there are still people trapped inside.
Firefighting
To join you alchemists guild you have to take 3 examinations. The second is to test your skill at identifying wild herbs.
Alchemy Guild 2:Forgaging Test
You stumble across a forgotten stash of treasure. It's yours for the taking!
Forgotten Treasure
You stumble across a room filled with locked chests. In the distance you can hear the sound of approaching monsters. Loot before they arrive!
Frantic Search
Before the gate to the depths stands a hulking creature wielding a pair of blades. If you want to go down you'll have to defeat it.
Gate Guardian
People often give quests for gathering potion herbs. These can prove a great source of income for the aspiring adventurer.
Gathering Herbs
People often give quests for gathering potion herbs. These can prove a great source of income for the aspiring adventurer.
Gathering Herbs
People often give quests for gathering potion herbs. These can prove a great source of income for the aspiring adventurer.
Gathering Herbs
Some treasure lies at the end of the room. The only issue is the monsters lining each side of it. Time to run the gauntlet!
Gauntlet
You come across a vault of gems, glittering in the torchlight. The only problem are the hulking golems stalking around.
Gem Hoard
Your peaceful farm life is shattered by the chittering cries of goblins smashing their way into your house.
You arrive at the village only to find it in flames. Quick, rescue anyone you can!
You see the goblins have erected a small town of tents in the cavern. It would be a shame if someone destroyed it all.
Your peaceful farm life is shattered by the chittering cries of goblins smashing their way into your house.
You arrive at the village only to find it in flames. Quick, rescue anyone you can!
The goblins have fled, leaving the village in ruins. You decide to track them back to their lair.
You arrive at the village only to find it in flames. Quick, rescue anyone you can!
Your peaceful farm life is shattered by the chittering cries of goblins smashing their way into your house.
At the center of the village stands a savage goblin shaman, the small beast directing the goblin horde. Take your revenge on him.
Goblin Scourge 1:Raiding Party
Goblin Scourge 2:Village Rescue
Goblin Scourge 2:Village Rescue
Goblin Scourge 1:Raiding Party
Goblin Scourge 3:Goblin Shaman
Goblin Scourge 2:Village Rescue
Goblin Scourge 1:Raiding Party
Goblin Scourge 4:Tracking
Goblin Scourge 5:Payback
A pack of monsters surrounds another that exudes an aura of deadliness. This will be a tough fight.
Greatest Showdown
Slaughtering heaps of monsters is a great way to get stronger.
Grinding Levels
One of the best ways to level up is slaughting vast swathes of mostly defenseless creatures.
Grinding Mobs
One of the best ways to level up is slaughting vast swathes of mostly defenseless creatures.
Grinding Mobs
One of the best ways to level up is slaughting vast swathes of mostly defenseless creatures.
Grinding Mobs
The adventurers guild posts all sorts of quests.
Guild Quest
It's never worthwhile to adventure on an empty stomach.
Hearty Meal
You stumble across a fountain, filled with water that glows with a holy light. The only issue is the swarm of monsters surrounding it.
Holy Fountain
You are surrounded by a vast swarm of monsters. Do your best to survive the onslaught!
Horde Mode
You find a large raw gemstone on your travels, and with a bit of work you could turn it into something marvelous.
Jewelry Work
You stumble across a chest, still locked. If you can break it open you may be able to grab some loot.
Locked Chest
You arrive at the mage academy and wait in a long queue to enter the admissions exams.
Mage Academy 1:Admissions 1
After a long wait the second round of admissions begins.
Mage Academy 2:Admissions 2
You have manage to get to the final round of the admissions. Just 1 more to go and you'll be an official mage!
Mage Admissions 3:Admissions 3
Focus your mind through meditation. Only then can your prepare for whatever happens.
Meditation
You stumble across a merchant surrounded by monsters.
Merchant Rescue
A group of giant creatures lurks beyond, the remains of dead adventurers littered around them.
Monsterous Menace
The alleyways of the city offer many opportunities, for those willing to explore them.
Alleyways
You get a quest to hunt and slay a named creature, a beast more formidable and ferocious than your average foe.
Named Monster Hunt
You come across a nest writhing with rat bodies. This is a perfect chance to thin the hordes numbers.
Writhing Nest
There's always need for an artificer, so anyone willing to do the work can make good money.
Parttime Artificing
Where to go next...
Crossroads
You visit an alchemist to buy some potions to enhance your body temporarily.
Potion Dealer
By learning to utilise your full strength you can greatly enhance the power of your abilities.
Power Training
Grayheart invites you on another boss raid.
Raid
As you approach the ruin you find a multitude of rats milling around the entrance.
Rat Encounter
You finally come across the boss, an enormous rat wearing a glowing crown.
Rat King
You find Barron facing down a hoard of enemies...
Recruit Barron
Just as you leave the city a man attracts your attention...
Recruiter
You find Felixa hunched over a large treasure chest...
Recruit Felixa
You find Ruffletop in the tavern, chatting to a young lady...
Recruit Ruffletop
You arrive at the crux of the ancient sewer network, a vast room filled with mold and water.
Sewer Outflow
You enter a room dominated by a long bridge. Skeleton mages stand on platforms all long the sides of this room.
Shooting Gallery
You come across a larger, fiercer monster. It's probably a rare creature so you should KILL IT.
Showdown
Some water lies between you and shiny loot. If you do this just right the treasure will skip straight into your hands.
Skipping Stones
As you proceed along the corridor suddenly a sound makes you jump to one side.
Sticky Ambush
Before you left on your adventure you wandered through the market. A vendor called out to you.
Street Vendor
Sometimes the gods listen to the prayers of the faithful. Were the gods attentive to you?
Temple Prayers
To become a knight of the Order of the Sun you have to pass a series of trials.
Order of the Sun 2:Trial of Endurance
To become a knight of the Order of the Sun you have to pass a series of trials.
Order of the Sun 1:Trial of Strength
To become a knight of the Order of the Sun you have to pass a series of trials.
Order of the Sun 3:Trial of Wisdom
Having sold out of produce you decide to enjoy the rest of the festival.
The Festival
Harvest time is always the most exhausting time of the year, and the culmination of all the efforts you have put in to this point. Don't mess it up!
The Harvest
The annual adventurers tournament is the place for a budding explorer to showcase their talents.
Tournament
You stumble across a travelling merchant, burdened by a multitude of goods.
Travelling Merchant
You find an unlooted treasure room.
Treasure Room
You find an unlooted treasure room.
Treasure Room
You find an unlooted treasure room.
Treasure Room
You find an unlooted treasure room.
Treasure Room
Heat blazes from a giant elemental filling one side of this cavern.
Unending Flame
You enter what looks like a giant cocoon. Webs cover every surface, and in the center lurks a vast, vile creature.
The Vile Witch
You spot some treasure in a locked room. The back wall of the room looks flimsy though. Maybe you can make your own door.
Wall Breaker
You find a locked case, the exact shape of a weapon. If you can break it open you can claim a nice reward.
Weapon Case
You enter a corridor filled with huge webs.
Web Ambush
To join you alchemists guild you have to take 3 examinations. The first is a written paper.
Alchemy Guild 1:Written Test
